org.apache.giraph.bsp

接口 CentralizedService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有已知子接口:
    CentralizedServiceMaster<I,V,E,M>, CentralizedServiceWorker<I,V,E,M>
    所有已知实现类:
    BspService, BspServiceMaster, BspServiceWorker

    public interface CentralizedService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Basic service interface shared by both CentralizedServiceMaster and CentralizedServiceWorker.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean checkpointFrequencyMet(long superstep)
      Given a superstep, should it be checkpointed based on the checkpoint frequency?
      long getRestartedSuperstep()
      Get the restarted superstep
      long getSuperstep()
      Get the current global superstep of the application to work on.
      List<WorkerInfo> getWorkerInfoList()
      Get list of workers

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSuperstep

        long getSuperstep()
        Get the current global superstep of the application to work on.
        返回:
        global superstep (begins at INPUT_SUPERSTEP)

      • getRestartedSuperstep

        long getRestartedSuperstep()
        Get the restarted superstep
        返回:
        -1 if not manually restarted, otherwise the superstep id

      • checkpointFrequencyMet

        boolean checkpointFrequencyMet(long superstep)
        Given a superstep, should it be checkpointed based on the checkpoint frequency?
        参数:
        superstep - superstep to check against frequency
        返回:
        true if checkpoint frequency met or superstep is 1.

      • getWorkerInfoList

        List<WorkerInfo> getWorkerInfoList()
        Get list of workers
        返回:
        List of workers
